name: Promoted Post Remover
description: A very simple style to hide promoted/sponsored posts on gawker media sites. For those of us sick of the adverts masquerading as articles for expensive crap that holds no interest for us and isn't available outside the US anyway.
additional_info:
V1.1
Trivial change due to chrome/kinja css peculiarity.

V1.0
Hides all elements with the js_promoted class.
